title.narrative: She Leads Mali: GYW perspectives are included in gender-responsive laws and practices and societal norms & practices

description.narrative: Mali is a highly patriarchal society where men have exercise authority and power at all levels, from the household to the economic, social and political spheres. Women are expected to respect and obey men’s and boys’ decisions without questioning. A survey conducted in 2013 reported that over 80% of people in Mali believe gender equality is an imported concept that does not resonate with African values and belief systems.
Expenditure 2021
Terre des Hommes Foundation Lausanne/1st installment 2021 ML
Terre des Hommes Foundation Lausanne/2nd installment 2021 sh
Terre des Hommes Foundation Lausanne/First installment 2022
